content.rendered:
ACT FOR PEACE AND SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT IN AFRICA

We live in a war-torn Africa, where millions of people have their lives destroyed by conflicts , where the natural resources are not sustainably managed and where Youths are underrepresented in the decision making platforms.

Join us for building a better world

In the midst of chaos, despair of conflict and destruction of biodiversity, the African Network of Young Leaders  for Peace and Sustainable Development is a unique sign of hope for those whose lives have been shattered by war and a unique sign of rebuilding the public space by integrating more voices, especially those of the youth and all vulnerable people into a true governance that takes into account the needs of Man and Nature.

Our neutrality and professionalism have always been vectors of integration, unity and reconstruction of African identity.

How can I make a donation by bank transfer?

Use the information below to make a donation by bank transfer.

Beneficiary: African Network of Young Leaders for Peace and Sustainable Development (ANYL4PSD)

SWIFT Code: CCEICMCX

IBAN Code: CM21 10005 00024 06460431001 – 08
